amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Neonatal Abstinence Syndrome research by $2 million, offset by spending in the office of the Secretary.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 44 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase funding for Neonatal Abstinence Syndrome research by $2 million, offset by spending in the office of the Secretary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 421 - 3 (Roll no. 291).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 421 - 3 (Roll no. 291).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A042) offered by Mrs. Miller.
